                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        Six people pay $\pounds 5.50$ each for a meal in a restaurant. They leave a $10 \%$ tip for the waiter. How much change do they receive from a $\pounds 50$ note?

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        As per the question,

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        Total expenditure $= 6 \times \pounds5.50$

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        $\pounds 33$

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        $ \begin{aligned} \text{Change} &= \text{Total money} - \text{Total expenditure} - \text{Tip} \\ &= 50 - 33 - \dfrac{1\cancel {0} }{1\cancel {0} \cancel {0} } \times 5 \cancel {0} \\ &= 50 - 33 - 5 \\ &= 50 - 28 \\ &= 22 \end{aligned} $

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        $22$

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        sevenoaks-school--11-plus--maths--2011--sample-paper-2.toml

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        rag_np_pr

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      • 81AADA28-3EE1-4D17-82EE-CBBF6BF4E0D7

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        • tmoney
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        • tnumber

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        Eliot made three purchases for $\pounds 3.12, \pounds 10.25$ and $\pounds 4.80$.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        What did he spend in total, to the nearest pound?

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        $ \begin{aligned} \text{Amount spent} &= 3.12 + 10.25 + 4.80 \\ &= \pounds 18.2 \end{aligned} $

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        $\pounds 18.2$

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        sevenoaks-school--11-plus--maths--2012--sample-paper-3.toml

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        rag_np_pr

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      • F83507F2-235E-4ABA-AC49-C50C6D08899E

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        • tpercentage

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        In a sale, normal prices were reduced by $35 \%$.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        TODOWORKING

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        TODOWORKING

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        TODOANSWER

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        TODOANSWER

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          • The normal price of a TV was $\pounds 600$. Work out the sale price of the TV.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            As per the question,

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            $ \begin{aligned} \text{Sale price of Tv} &= Normal Price - Discount \\ &= \pounds 600 - 35\% \text{ of} 600 \\ &= 600 - \dfrac {35} {100} \times 600 \\ &= 600 - \dfrac {35 \times 600} {100} \\ &= 600 - \dfrac {35 \times 6 \times 100} {100} \\ &= 600 - \dfrac {35 \times 6 \times \cancel {100}} {\cancel {100} } \\ &= 600 - 35 \times 6 \\ &= 600 - 210 \\ &= \pounds 390 \end{aligned} $

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            $\pounds 390$

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            • The normal price of a clock was reduced by $\pounds 140$. Work out the normal price of the clock.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              $

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Let the normal price $= a$.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              As per the question,

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              \begin{aligned} a - 35\% \text{ of} a &= 140 \\ a - \dfrac {35} {100} \times a &= 140 \\ a - \dfrac {35 \times a} {100} &= 140 \\ a - \dfrac {35 \times a} {100} &= 140 \times 100 \\ a - \dfrac {7 \times 5 \times a} {5 \times 20} &= 14000 \\ a - \dfrac {7 \times \cancel {5} \times a} { \cancel {5} \times 20} &= 14000 \\ a - \dfrac {7a} {20} &= 14000 \\
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              \dfrac {20a - 7a} {20} &= 14000 \\\ 20a - 7a &= 14000 \times 20 \\\ 13a &= 280000 \\\ a &= \dfrac {280000} {13} \\ a &= \pounds 2153.84 \end{aligned} $

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              $\pounds 2153.84$

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • The sale price of a computer was $\pounds 884$. Work out the normal price of the computer.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                Let the normal price of $= a$,

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                As per the question,

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                $ \begin{aligned} a - 35\% \text{ of}a &= 884 \\ a - \dfrac {35} {100} \times a &= 884 \\ a - \dfrac {7 \times 5} {20 \times 5} &= 884 \\ a - \dfrac {7 \times \cancel {5} } {20 \times \cancel {5} } &= 884 \\ a - \dfrac {7a} {20} &= 884 \\ \dfrac {20a - 7a} {20} &= 884 \\ \dfrac {13a} {20} &= 884 \\ 13a &= 884 \times 20 \\ 13a &= 17680 \\ a &= \dfrac {17680} {13} \\\ a &= \dfrac {1360 \times 13} {13} \\\ a &= \dfrac {1360 \times \cancel {13} } {\cancel{13} } \\\ a &= \pounds 1360 \end{aligned} $

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                $\pounds 1360$

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              sevenoaks-school--11-plus--maths--2012--sample-paper-3.toml

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              rag_np_pr

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            • B6EEAA19-D6EB-4A7E-8078-F1B4EA5EB197

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • tmoney

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Bella is given $\pounds 50$ for her birthday. She spends $\pounds 37.50$ on clothes. She then goes to the cinema with a friend, but as they have a $2$ for $1$ voucher, they only spend $\pounds 5.40$ between the two of them which they both pay half. She buys some popcorn and a drink for $\pounds 3.20$.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              TODOWORKING

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  • Bella's friend wants to go out for supper. Bella knows that she needs to save $\pounds 2.50$ for the bus home. Assuming Bella and her friend both pay an equal amount; can Bella afford any of the food deals below? If so, which one?

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    DEAL 1: Buy one meal for $\pounds 7$, get the second half price.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    DEAL 2: $10 \%$ off all dishes costing $\pounds 5$ or more.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    DEAL 3: Buy one get one free on all dishes costing $\pounds 8$ or more.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  rag_up_notstarted

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • B14230C1-397F-4229-962F-877D59B5C1B2

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  • tmoney

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  Danielle went to the store to buy stationery for school. She bought four rulers, five pens and three pencils. The rulers cost $46 \text{p}$ each, the pens cost $37 \text{p}$ each and the pencils cost $13 \text{p}$ each.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  TODOWORKING

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  TODOWORKING

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  TODOANSWER

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  TODOANSWER

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    • How much did she pay in total for her stationery?

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      As per question Danielle bought,

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      $4$ Rulers for $46\text{p}$ each

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      $5$ Pens for $37\text{p}$ each

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      $3$ Pencils for $3\text{p}$ each

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      Let's calculate how did she pay in total.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      $ \begin{aligned} \text {Rulers} &= 4 \times 46\text{p} \\ &= 184 \\ \text {Pens} &= 5 \times 37 \\ &= 185p \\ \text {Pencils} &= 3 \times 13 \\ &= 39 \text{p} \\ \end{aligned} $

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      Total paid is cost of all Rulers + Pens + Pencils.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      Total $= 184 + 185 + 39$

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      $ \begin{array}{cccc} & 1 & 8 & 4 \ & 1 & 8 & 5 \ {}+ & & 3 & 9 \ \hline & 4 & 0 & 8 \ \hline \end{array} $

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      Danielle paid $409\text{p}$ or $\pounds 4.08$ for her total purchases.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      $408\text{p}$ or $\pounds 4.08$

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      • If she paid with a $\pounds 10$ note, how much change did she get?

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        $ \begin{aligned} \text {To pay} &= \pounds 4.08 \ \text {Paid} &= \pounds 10 \ \end{aligned} $

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        $ \begin{array}{ccccc} & 1 & 0 \ . & 0 & 0 \ {}- & & 4 \ . & 0 & 8 \ \hline & & 5 \ . & 9 & 2 \ \hline \end{array} $

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        Danielle got $\pounds 5.92$ back.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        $\pounds 5.92$

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      sevenoaks-school--11-plus--maths--2015--sample-paper-6.toml

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      rag_up_notstarted

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    • 312B54F7-8745-4C65-B52D-35F6198E8ACD

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      • tmoney

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      Gavin spends $\pounds 4.90$ on two items in a shop. One item cost $40 \text{p}$ more than the other. How much did each item cost?

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      Let's take the cost of 1st item as $x$

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      As per question,

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      the cost of 2nd item is $x + 40\text{p}$ or $x + \pounds 0.40$

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      Total cost $\pounds 4.90$

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      $\quad = \text{Cost of item} \ 1$ + Cost of item $2$

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      $ \begin{aligned} x + (x + \pounds 0.40) &= 4.90 \\ x + x + 0.40 &= 4.90 \\ 2x + 0.40 &= 4.90 \\ 2x &= 4.90 - 0.40 \\ 2x &= 4.50 \\ x &= 2.25 \\ x &= \pounds 2.25\\ \end{aligned} $

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      Cost of the Item $1$ is $\pounds 2.25$

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      Let's find cost of the Item $2$.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      $ \begin{aligned} &= 2.25 + 0.40 \\ &= 2.65 \\ &= \pounds 2.65 \\ \end{aligned} $

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      Cost of the 2nd item is $\pounds 2.65$

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      $\pounds 2.65$ and $\pounds 2.25$

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      sevenoaks-school--11-plus--maths--2015--sample-paper-6.toml

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      rag_up_notstarted

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    • A6B8B57F-EC4F-46B7-B764-FB72554BB7C3

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      • tmoney
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      • tpercentage

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      Seesaws cost $\pounds 200$ each in January 2010. In January 2011 they had gone up by $45 \%$. Calculate how much a seesaw cost in January 2011.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      As per question cost of Seesaws in Jan. $2010 = \pounds 200$

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      Percentage of increase in price in $2011 = 45 \%$

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      First let's find how much is $45 \%$ of $\pounds 200$. That is the $\%$$ of increase in $2011.$

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      $ \begin{aligned} &= \pounds 200 \times \dfrac {45}{100} \\ &= 2 \cancel {00} \times \dfrac {45}{1 \cancel {00}} \\ &= 2 \times 45 \\ &= \pounds 90 \\ \end{aligned} $

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      $45 \%$ of $\pounds 200$ is $\pounds 90$, and that is the increase in price in $2011$ as compared to $2010$

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      Let's now find the actual price of Seesaws in Jan. $2011$

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      Price in $2011

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      $ Price in $2010$ + (Increase in $2011$)

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      $ \begin{aligned} &= \pounds 200 + \pounds 90 \\ &= \pounds 290\\ \end{aligned} $

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      In January $2011$ A seesaw costed $\pounds 290$

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      $\pounds 290$

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      sevenoaks-school--11-plus--maths--2015--sample-paper-6.toml

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      rag_up_notstarted

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    • EF38AE5F-0E2D-457D-BC03-05E80C5371F1

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      • tmoney
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      • talgebra

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      $39$ members of Alwick Youth Club went on an outing to a leisure centre. They went in minibuses which could seat up to $15$ members.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      TODOANSWER

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      TODOANSWER

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      TODOANSWER

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        • How many minibuses were needed?

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          No. of members = $39$

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          Max. seating in minibus = $15$ per minibuses

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          Let's find how many buses are needed to accomadate $39$ members.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          $ \begin{aligned} &= 15 + 15 + 9 \ &= 3 \text {minibuses} \end{aligned} $

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          $ \begin{aligned} &= 39 \div 15 \ &= 2 \ r \ 9 \end{aligned} $

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          For the remaining $9$ members $1$ more bus is needed.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          So, total of $3$ buses are needed for $39$ members.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          $3$ minibuses

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          • How many spare seats were there?

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            As per the answer above there were $9$ members in the $3$rd bus.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            A bus could seat up to $15$ members

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            So,

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            $15 - 9 = 6$

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            There were $6$ spares seats.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            $6$ seats

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            • The transport costs were $\pounds 90$ altogether. They also had to pay $\pounds 150$ for the group to use the leisure centre. Helen collected $\pounds 6.50$ from each passenger to pay for this.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              How much was left over?

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Transport cost $= \pounds 90$

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Leisure centre costs $ = \pounds 150$

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Total Expenses = Transport cost + Leisure centre costs

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              $= \pounds 90 + \pounds 150$

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              $= \pounds 240$

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              So, Total Expenses $= \pounds 240$

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Now let's find total money collected

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Money collected by Helen = members $\times$ collection per member
