                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              I am counting up the money from the tombola at the end of the school fair.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              %empty%

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              %empty%

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • There are twenty four $\pounds 1$ coins, seven $\pounds 2$ coins , six $\pounds 5$ notes,fourteen $\pounds 10$ notes, three $\pounds 20$ notes and one $\pounds 50$ note.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  How much money is there in total?

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  $ \begin{aligned} \text {Total money} &= 24 \times 1 + 7 \times 2 + 6 \times 5 + 14 \times 10 + 3 \times 20 + 50 \\ &= 24 + 14 + 30 + 140 + 60 + 50 \\ &= \pounds 318 \end{aligned} $

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  $\pounds 318$

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  • I exchange all of the money for as many $\pounds 20$ notes as possible. How many $\pounds 20$ notes do I have now?

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    $ \begin{aligned} \text{Maximum } \pounds 20 \text{ notes} &= \dfrac {318} {20} \\ &= \dfrac {2 \times 159} {2 \times 10} \\ &= \dfrac {\cancel {2} \times 159} {\cancel {2} \times 10} \\ &= \dfrac {159} {10} \\ &= 15.9 \\ &= 15.9 \text{ remainder } 18 \end{aligned} $

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    $\pounds 20 \text{ notes} = 15$

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    $15$

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  st-albans-school--11-plus--maths--2019--sample-paper-1.toml

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  rag_ej_g1

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • FC4F6CFA-9375-4C0E-8FA7-3428B8E1BD56

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  • tmoney
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  • talgebra

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  Martha and Sally each have the same amount of money.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  If Martha spends $\pounds 10$ and sally spends $\pounds 20$, then Martha has three times as much as Sally.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  If Martha spends $\pounds 15$ and Sally spends $\pounds 20$, then Martha has twice as much as Sally.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  how much money do they have altogether?

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  Let money Martha has be m and Sally has be s,

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  $ \begin{aligned} m - 10 = 3 \times (s - 20) \\ m - 10 = 3s - 60 \\ 3s - m = 50 \\ m = 3s -50 \end{aligned} $

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  $ \begin{aligned} m - 15 = 2 \times (s - 20) \\ m - 15 = 2s - 40 \\ 2s - m = 25 \end{aligned} $

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  Replacing m in second question

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  $ \begin{aligned} 2s - 3s + 50 = 25 \\ s = 25 \end{aligned} $

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  Value of m will be, $ \begin{aligned} m = 3s - 50 \\ m = 75 - 50 \\ m = 25 \end{aligned} $

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  Total money both has, $ \begin{aligned} &= 25 + 25 \\ &= \pounds 50 \end{aligned} $

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  $\pounds 50$

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  st-albans-school--11-plus--maths--2019--sample-paper-1.toml

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  rag_ej_pr

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • AAB63DDE-7AE5-4CBB-B9C4-86695C3EA843

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  • tmoney

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  %empty%

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  %empty%

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    • $240$ people paid to go to the museum on Monday. How much money is that altogether?

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      $ \begin{aligned} \text {Entrance fee for 240 people} &= 240 \times \pounds 1.20 \\ &= \pounds 288 \end{aligned} $

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      $\pounds 288$

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    st-anselms-college--11-plus--maths--2018--sample-paper-3.toml

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    rag_ej_g1

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  • 655C3EF2-4B38-45E9-8354-01DF35EC3875

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    The museum took a total of $\pounds 600$ in entrance fees one Friday. How many people paid to visit the museum that Friday?

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    I buy $22$ items which cost $\pounds 7.05$ each.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    %empty%

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    %empty%

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      • What is the total cost?

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        $ \begin{aligned} \text {Total cost} &= 22 \times \pounds 7.05 \\ &= \pounds 155.1 \end{aligned} $

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        $\pounds 155.1$

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        • If you worked out the answer to part $(a)$ on a calculator, what would the display show?

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          $\pounds 155.1$

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          $\pounds 155.1$

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        st-anselms-college--11-plus--maths--9999--sample-paper-1.toml

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        rag_ej_pr

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      • 74C05D8E-262C-47B1-ABB4-5F06E493406E

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        • tmoney

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        Tickets for the zoo cost $\pounds 9.30$ for adults and $\pounds 6.40$ for children.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        %empty%

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        %empty%

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          • How much would it cost for $6$ adults to go to the zoo?

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            $ \begin{aligned} &= \pounds {9.30} \times 6 \\ &= \pounds 55.8 \end{aligned} $

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            $\pounds 55.8$

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            • How much would it cost for $3$ adults and $4$ children?

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              $ \begin{aligned} &= \pounds {9.30} \times 3 + \pounds {6.40} \times 4 \\ &= \pounds 27.9 + 25.6 \\ &= \pounds 53.5 \end{aligned} $

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              $\pounds 53.5$

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • What is the maximum number of people that can go to the zoo for $\pounds 30$?

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                $ \begin{aligned} &= 4 \ \text {people} \end{aligned} $

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                $4 \ \text {people}$

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              st-anselms-college--11-plus--maths--9999--sample-paper-1.toml

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              rag_ej_pr

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            • 7AB1C6A0-22A3-4EBC-A247-55F381AF4F47

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • tprofit
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • tmoney

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              A calculator normally costs $\pounds 3.80$. It is offered in a sale at $25\%$ off. What is the sale price?

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              $ \begin{aligned} &= 25 \% \ \text {of} \pounds 3.80 \\ &= \dfrac {25} {100} \times 3.80 \\ &= 0.25 \times 3.80 \\ &= \pounds 0.95 \end{aligned} $

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              $\pounds 0.95$

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              st-anselms-college--11-plus--maths--9999--sample-paper-1.toml

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              rag_ej_pr

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            • 714AC34D-AA55-45CA-A28E-C0DB3E0A56F8

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              I buy 12 items which cost $\pounds 3.05$ each.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              %empty%

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              %empty%

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • What is the total cost?

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  $ \begin{aligned} \text{Total cost} &= 12 \ \times \pounds 3.05 \\ &= \pounds 26.6 \end{aligned} $

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  $\pounds {26.6}$

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  • If you worked out the answer to part (a) on a calculator, what would the display show?

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    $\pounds {26.6}$

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    $\pounds {26.6}$
