                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        A calculator costs $\pounds 1.75$. In 1979 the same calculator cost 24 times as much. How much did the calculator cost in 1979?

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        $ \begin{aligned} &= \pounds 1.75 \times 24 \\ &= \pounds 42 \end{aligned} $

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        $\pounds 42$

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        st-anselms-college--11-plus--maths--9999--sample-paper-2.toml

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        rag_ej_pr

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      • ADBF2411-1D01-472E-9BC0-7C51FF7A56D5

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        • tmoney

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        I buy 5 items which cost $\pounds 12.98$ each.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        %empty%

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        %empty%

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          • What is the total cost?

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            $ \begin{aligned} \text{Total cost} &= 5 \ \times \pounds 12.98 \\ &= \pounds 64.9 \end{aligned} $

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            $\pounds 64.9$

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            • If you worked out the answer to part $(a)$ on a calculator, what would the display show?

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              $\pounds 64.9$

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              $\pounds 64.9$

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            st-anselms-college--11-plus--maths--9999--sample-paper-4.toml

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            rag_ej_pr

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          • 08225CB2-D581-41F3-8761-A49B7C43EE9B

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            • ttime
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            • tmoney

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            A man starts work at $08:15$. He then has a break from $10:15$ to $10:35$. After his break he continues working until $12:50$.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            %empty%

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            %empty%

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • For how many hours and minutes was he working?

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                $ \begin{aligned} &= 12 {:} 50 - 8 {:} 15 - 20 \ \text{minutes} \\ &= 4 {:} 40 - 20 \ \text{minutes} \\ &= 4 {:} 20 \\ &= 4 \ \text{hour} 40 \ \text{minutes} \end{aligned} $

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                $4 \ \text{hour} 40 \ \text{minutes}$

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • If he is paid $\pounds 6.00$ for each hour worked, how much will he be paid for all the work?

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  As per the question, For one hour i.e for 60 minutes he is paid $=\pounds 6.00$ For one minute he will be paid $=\pounds \dfrac {1} {10}$ So, for 4 hours 40 minutes i.e. 280 minutes he will be paid,

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  $ \begin{aligned} &= \dfrac {280} {10} \\ &= \dfrac {28 \cancel{0}} {1 \cancel{0}} \\ &= \pounds 28 \end{aligned} $

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  $&= \pounds 28$

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                st-anselms-college--11-plus--maths--9999--sample-paper-4.toml

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                rag_ej_pr

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • 36EC9CE8-1BB5-4F5F-B3D5-4C7DD0031E66

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • tmoney
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • tprofit

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                Tickets for the zoo cost $\pounds 12.50$ for adults and $\pounds 8.00$ for children.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                %empty%

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                %empty%

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  • How much would it cost for $6$ adults to go to the zoo?

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    $ \begin{aligned} &= 6 \times \pounds 12.50 \\ &= \pounds 75 \end{aligned} $

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    $\pounds 75$

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    • How much would it cost for $3$ adults and $4$ children?

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      $ \begin{aligned} &= 3 \times \pounds 12.50 + 4 \times \pounds 8.00 \\ &= 37.5 + 32 \\ &= \pounds 69.5 \end{aligned} $

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      $\pounds 69.5$

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      • The zoo has a Family Ticket for sale which allows two adults and three children to visit the zoo. The ticket costs $\pounds 38.00$. How much is saved by buying the Family Ticket instead of five separate tickets?

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        $ \begin{aligned} &= 2 \times \pounds 12.50 + 3 \times \pounds 8.00 - \pounds 38.00 \\ &= 25 + 16 - \pounds 38.00 \\ &= \pounds 41 - \pounds 38.00 \\ &= \pounds 2 \end{aligned} $

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        $2$

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      st-anselms-college--11-plus--maths--9999--sample-paper-4.toml

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      rag_ej_pr

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    • 33BA3A42-D90E-400D-A934-CADF6E6B81F9

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      • tmoney

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      $2$ packets of crisps and $2$ drinks cost $\pounds 1.50$. $2$ packets of crisps and $1$ drink costs $\pounds 1.10$. How much would $4$ packets of crisps and $3$ drinks cost?

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      TODOWORKING

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      Hannah went to the shop. She bought a magazine that cost $\pounds 3.50$,$3$ bars of chocolate that cost $55 \text{p}$ each and a packet of sweets. She paid with a $\pounds 10$ note and was given $\pounds 4.20$ change. How much did the sweets cost?

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      TODOWORKING

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      rag_up_notstarted

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    • 2FB7FD94-DCE7-416B-94DB-D40514D8544D

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      • taddition
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      • tmoney

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      $\pounds 1.28 + 57 \text{p}$

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      It is really important to use the right units in calculations and convert where required.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      $ \begin{array}{cccccccccc} &= \pounds1.28 - 57 \text{p} \\ &= 128 \text{p} + 57 \text{p} \\ &= 185 \text{p} \\ &= \pounds 1.85 \end{array} $

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      $\pounds 1.85$

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      st-georges-college--11-plus--maths--2012--sample-paper-1.toml

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      rag_bs_pr

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    • 5171E4DB-A0AE-48C2-A77F-6BE170E11A11

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      • tsubtraction
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      • tmoney

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      $\pounds 1.28 - 57 \text{p}$

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      It is really important to use the right units in calculations and convert where required.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      $ \begin{array}{cccccccccc} &= \pounds1.28 - 57 \text{p} \\ &= 128 \text{p} - 57 \text{p} \\ &= 71 \text{p} \\ &= \pounds 0.71 \end{array} $

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      $\pounds 0.71$

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      st-georges-college--11-plus--maths--2012--sample-paper-1.toml

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      rag_bs_pr

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    • 22F0AF00-1223-4113-ADF7-3D982D74034B

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      • talgebra
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      • tmoney

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      For a film, the seats cost $\pounds 3$ for each child and $\pounds 7$ for each adult. I was charged $\pounds 51$ for all the seats I bought.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      %empty%

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      %empty%

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        • Did I buy more than $7$ adult tickets?

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          Cost of each child seat = $\pounds 3$

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          Cost of each Adult seat = $\pounds 7$

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          As per the question,

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          $ \begin{aligned} \text{let number of child seats = x} \ \text{let number of Adult seats = y} \ \text{Total cost = \pounds 51} \ 3x+7y=51 \ \text{No, we can't buy more than 7 Adult tickets because it will cost more than \pounds 51} \end{aligned} $

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          No

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          • If there were more adult tickets than child tickets, how many of each did I buy?

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            $ \begin{aligned} \text {As per the equation 3x+7y=51} \ & 3x+7y=51 \ & 3\times(3)+7\times(6)=51 \ & \pounds 51=\pounds 51 \end{aligned} $

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            6 adult tickets and 3 child tickets

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            • If there were more child tickets than adult tickets, how many of each did I buy?

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              $ \begin{aligned} \text {As per the equation 3x+7y=51} \ & 3x+7y=51 \ & 3\times(10)+7\times(21)=51 \ & \pounds 51=\pounds 51 \end{aligned} $

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              3 adult tickets and 10 child tickets

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            st-georges-college--11-plus--maths--2012--sample-paper-1.toml

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            rag_bs_pr

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          • 1219A3ED-0814-4A5C-AA62-80C6F0E44674

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            • tnumber
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            • tmoney

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            On a trip to France, I found that one English pound was worth $1.2 \ \text{Euros}$. So for example, I would receive $2.4 \ \text{Euros}$ in exchange for $\pounds 2$.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            %empty%

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            %empty%

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • On a ferry to France, I wanted to buy a large bar of Toblerone chocolate, which cost $\pounds 3$. How many Euros would I have to pay for it?

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                English poundEuro
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                $\pounds 1$$1.2$
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                $\pounds 2$$2.4$
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                $\pounds 3$$3.6$

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                As per the question,

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                $ \begin{aligned} \text{Let be Euro x for \pounds 3 } \ \text{then}\ \ & x = 3 \times 1.2 \ & x = 3.6 \ \text{Euro} \end{aligned} $

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                $3.6 \ \text{Euro}$

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • A certain bottle of wine in France costs $7.5 \ \text{Euros}$. How much is that in English pounds?

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  As per the question,

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  $ \begin{aligned} \text{Let be English pound x for 7.5 Euro} \ \text{then}\ \ & 1.2x = 7.5 \ & x = \dfrac{75}{12} \\ & x = \dfrac{\cancel{75}25}{\cancel{12}4} \\ & x =\pounds 6.25 \end{aligned} $

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  $\pounds 6.25$

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                st-georges-college--11-plus--maths--2012--sample-paper-1.toml

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                rag_bs_pr

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • 5532584A-CE17-4B4B-B43F-B4E567FC5002

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • tmoney

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          Three friends went to a burger restaurant.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          Tom had a burger and chips and he paid $\pounds 8.00$.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          Fred had two burgers and a drink. Fred paid $\pounds 15.00$.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          Jo had a burger and a drink. Jo paid $\pounds 8.50$.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          Work out the cost of the burger, the chips and the drink.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          TODOWORKING

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          Rob works $40 \ \text{hours}$ a week and earns $\pounds 440. What is his hourly rate of pay?

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          This can be solved using ratios.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          As per question, Rob works $40 \ \text{hours}$ a week and earns $\pounds 440$. So,

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          $ \begin{aligned} 40 \ \text{hours} & : \pounds 440 \\ \dfrac {40}{40} & : \dfrac {440}{40} \\ \dfrac {\cancel {40}}{ \cancel {40}}& : \dfrac {44 \cancel 0}{4 \cancel 0} \\ 1 & : \dfrac{44}{4} \\ 1 & : \dfrac{4 \times 11}{4} \\ 1 & : \dfrac{\cancel 4 \times 11}{\cancel 4} \\ 1 \ \text{hour} & : \pounds 11
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          \end{aligned} $
