                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  $\underline {\text {B}}$ and $\underline {\text {D}}$ give the same value for money, and

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  $\underline {\text {C}}$ and $\underline {\text {E}}$ give the same value for money.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  the-haberdashers-askes-boys-school--11-plus--maths--2010--sample-paper-2.toml

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  rag_jn_oldpr

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • 821275C1-8DB4-4E05-91B4-87F51A34EDD4

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  • tmoney
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  • talgebra

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  Four friends, Alwyn, Bax, Coates and Delius have lunch together. Although each eats a differently priced snack, they share the bill equally. Yesterday, this resulted in Alwyn paying $\pounds 1$ less than the cost of his snack, Bax paying $\pounds 3$ more, Coates $\pounds 4$ less and Delius paid $\pounds 4$. What was the actual price of the snack that each friend ordered?

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  As per the question,

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  All four friends shared the bill equally.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  Delius paid $\pounds 4$. So, all four friends paid $\pounds 4$ each.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  TODOWORKING

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  TODOANSWER

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • 531ECA32-EC61-4DC0-B7E2-A82CE25C7F7E

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  • tmoney

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  I have $\pounds 8.17$ credit on my mobile phone. At the end of a phone call this falls to $\pounds 7.65$. How much did the call cost?

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  $ \begin{aligned} & = \text {Start credit} - \text {Used credit} \\ & = 8.17 - 7.65 \\ & = \pounds 0.52
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  \end{aligned} $

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  The call cost me $\pounds 0.52$

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  $\pounds 0.52$

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  the-haberdashers-askes-boys-school--11-plus--maths--2011--sample-paper-3.toml

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  rag_jn_oldpr

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • A01A640F-EDFD-4999-9FB4-D5CB13DE99BE

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  • tmoney

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  Barbie earns $\pounds 23450$ a year and her partner Ken earns $\pounds 700$ less than Barbie. How much do the couple earn altogether?

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  As per the question,

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  Total earning:

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  $ \begin{aligned} & = \text {{Barbie} + \text {Ken} \\ & = \text {{Barbie} + \text {Barbie - 700} \\ & = \text {{23450} + \text {23450 - 700} \\
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  & = 23450 + 22750 \\ & = \pounds 46200
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  \end{aligned} $

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  The couple earn altogether $=\pounds 46200$

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  $\pounds 46200$

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  the-haberdashers-askes-boys-school--11-plus--maths--2011--sample-paper-3.toml

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  rag_jn_oldpr

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • 12F567E6-42DC-4EE3-A2CE-D09D970305D7

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  • tmoney
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  • tpercentage

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  The rate of VAT (value-added tax) in this country is $20\%$. In the shop CoCost, the price of a TV excluding VAT is $\pounds 550$. Work out the cost of the TV after the VAT is added on.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  $ \begin{aligned} \text{VAT} & = 20 \% \ \text{of} \ \pounds 550 \\ & = \dfrac {20} {100} \times 550 \\ & = \dfrac {2 \cancel 0} {1 \cancel 0 \cancel 0} \times \dfrac {55 \cancel 0} {1} \\ & = 2 \times 55 \\ & = \pounds 110
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  \end{aligned} $

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  Total cost of TV = Price of TV + VAT

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  $ \begin{aligned} & = \pounds 550 + \pounds 110 \\ & = \pounds 660
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  \end{aligned} $

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  The cost of the TV after the VAT is added on $=\pounds 660$

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  $\pounds 660$

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    • The price of a diamond ring, including VAT is $\pounds 1200$. Work out the cost of the ring before the VAT was added on.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    • tmoney

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    $1$ British pound ($\pounds$) = $1.5$ American dollars (US$\$$) $1$ British pound ($\pounds$) = $2$ New Zealand dollars (NZ$\$$)

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        Once upon a time, in the Ancient Wizarding World of Haberdasher's

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        One pound $= 20 \ \text{shillings}$

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        One shilling $= 12 \ \text{pence}$

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        A large Margarine-beer costs $1 \ \text{pound} \ 4 \ \text{shillings}$ and $9 \ \text{pence}$.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        A small Margarine-beer costs $14 \ \text{shillings}$ and $5 \ \text{pence}$.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        TODOWORKING

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        TODOWORKING

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        TODOANSWER

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          • Work out the difference in price between a small and large beer. Give your answer in shillings and pence.

Give your answer in pounds, shillings and pence.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            Snow White and the seven dwarves work in a mining company. As Chief Executive, Snow White earns as much as all the dwarves put together. Sneezy gets $24$ gold galleons a day. Sleepy earns $50\%$ more than Happy. Bashful earns twice as much as Grumpy who earns one more galleon than Sneezy. Doc gets $24$ galleons a day more than Dopey and between them they get four times that of Sneezy. Sleepy earns seven-eighths of Sneezy's salary.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            Complete the table below to work out how much Snow White earns in a day.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            Bashful Doc Dopey Grumpy Happy Sleepy Sneezy Snow White Gold Galleons Snow White

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            In the American state of Kentucky sales tax is charged at $6\%$.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            TODOWORKING

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • Anila wants to buy a pair of jeans in Kentucky. They are priced at $\$72$ before allowing for the sales tax. How much does Anila pay for the pair of jeans?

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                Stuart's patio is $5 \ \text{metres}$ long and $5 \ \text{metres}$ wide.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                Stuart wants to cover the patio with paving stones. Each paving stone is $50 \ \text{centimetres}$ long and $50 \ \text{centimetres}$ wide.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                How many paving stones does Stuart need to buy?

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                TODOWORKING

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  • Stuart has $\pounds 200$ left after buying the paving stones. Stuart wants to put a picket fence around three sides of his patio.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    Each panel of picket fencing is $1 \ \text{metre}$ long and costs $\pounds 10.50$. Stuart will also have to pay a delivery charge of $\pounds 5$ regardless of the number of panels of picket fencing he purchases.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    How much money does Stuart have left after buying the picket fencing?

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  Farmer Fred needs to build a rectangular sheep pen.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  To save money, he decides to build it against his barn, so that he only needs to have fencing on three sides.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  Here is the first plan:

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          • He decides to buy $15 \ \text{metres}$ of fence.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              the-independent-schools-examinations-board--11-plus--maths--2008--sample-paper-1.toml

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              rag_up_notstarted

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            • C04D3FE2-1ED5-42C3-B47B-B379F41605E8

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • tnumber
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • tmoney

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Alex enjoys taking photographs.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              He takes $86$ photographs on Monday and $58$ photographs on Tuesday

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              %empty%

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              %empty%

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • How many photographs does he take altogether?

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  $ \begin{aligned} &= 86 + 58 \\ &= 144 \end{aligned} $

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  $144$

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  • Alex puts his photographs in an album. $6$ photographs fit on each page.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    How many pages does he use?

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    $ \begin{aligned} &= \dfrac {144} {6} \\ &= \dfrac {24 \times 6} {6} \\ &= \dfrac {24 \times \cancel {6}} {\cancel {6}} \\ &= 24 \end{aligned} $

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    $24$

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      • An enlargement costs $\pounds 2.65$ Alex buys $7$ enlargements.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        How much do his enlargements cost in total?

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        $ \begin{aligned} &= 2.65 \times 7 \\ &= \pounds 18.55 \end{aligned} $

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        $\pounds 18.55$

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        • Alex pays with a $\pounds 20$ note.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          How much change does he get?

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          $ \begin{aligned} &= 20 - 18.55 \\ &= \pounds 1.45 \end{aligned} $

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          $\pounds 1.45$

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      the-independent-schools-examinations-board--11-plus--maths--2008--sample-paper-2.toml

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                Ryan collects football cards.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                Last week he bought $56$ football cards.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                This week he bought $72$ football cards.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                TODOWORKING

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                TODOWORKING

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                TODOANSWER

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  • How many football cards did he buy in total?

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    TODOWORKING

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    TODOWORKING

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    TODOANSWER

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    TODOANSWER

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    • Football cards are sold in packs.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      Each pack contains $8$ cards.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      How many packs of football cards did Ryan buy altogether?

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      TODOWORKING

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        Each pack costs $35 \ \text{pence}$.
