                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            In a lucky dip there are $10$ envelopes.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            $6$ envelopes contain a note saying ‚ÄúBetter luck next time!‚Äù

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            The other $4$ envelopes contain prizes:

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            One contains $\pounds 1$

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            One contains $\pounds 2$

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            One contains $\pounds 5$

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            One contains $\pounds 10$

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            TODOWORKING

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                What is the probability that she has won a prize?

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                the-kings-school-chester--11-plus--maths--9999--sample-paper-1.toml

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                rag_up_notstarted

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • B3590B28-F9F4-4AF1-A6F9-B3E29CC79878

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • tratio
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • tmoney

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                %empty%

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                %empty%

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                %empty%

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  • At a supermarket $3 \ \text{kilograms}$ of apples costs $\pounds 12$.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    How much does $18 \ \text{kilograms}$ of apples cost?

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    As per the question,

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    $ \begin{aligned} \text {Total cost} &= 18 \times \dfrac {12} {3} \\ &= \dfrac {6 \times 3 \times 12} {3} \\ &= \dfrac {6 \times \cancel {3} \times 12} {\cancel {3} } \\ &= \pounds 72 \end{aligned} $

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    $\pounds 72$

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    • At the same supermarket $10 \ \text{kilograms}$ of oranges costs $\pounds 14$.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      How much does $4 \ \text{kilograms}$ of oranges cost?

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      As per the question,

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      Cost of 4 kilograms of oranges

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      $ \begin{aligned} &= 4 \times \dfrac {12} {3} \\ &= \dfrac {4 \times 12} {3} \\ &= \dfrac {4 \times 4 \times 3} {3} \\ &= \dfrac {4 \times 4 \times \cancel{3} } {\cancel {3} } \\ &= \pounds 16 \end{aligned} $

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      $\pounds 16$

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      • $3$ fully open taps fill up a bath in $60 \ \text{seconds}$.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        How long will $2$ fully open taps take to fill up the same bath?

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        $ \begin{aligned} \text{Time taken} &= 2 \times \dfrac {60} {3} \\ &= \dfrac {60 \times 2} {3} \\ &= \dfrac {3 \times 20 \times 2} {3} \\ &= \dfrac {\cancel {3} \times 20 \times 2} {\cancel {3} } \\ &= 40 \text{ seconds} \end{aligned} $

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        $40 \text{ seconds}$

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      the-kings-school-chester--11-plus--maths--9999--sample-paper-2.toml

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      rag_up_notstarted

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    • 79878C87-2773-4780-A7A4-8B6AD9913BF1

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      • tmoney
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      • tratio

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      $3$ Mars bars and $1$ Crunchie bar costs $\pounds 1.90$.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      $1$ Mars bars and $1$ Crunchie bar costs $90 \ \text{pence}$.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          A recipe for making $12$ large chocolate chunk cookies includes the following ingredients:

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          $300 \ \text{g}$ plain chocolate

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          $100 \ \text{g}$ sugar

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          $85 \ \text{g}$ butter

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          $1$ large egg

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          $\dfrac{1}{2}$ teaspoon vanilla extract

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          $100 \ \text{g}$ self-raising flour

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • Jamie calculates that the cost of making $30$ cookies is $\pounds 5.10$. If he sells all 30 cookies at $26 \text{p}$ each, how much profit will he make?

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Suki buys $500 \ \text{g}$ of sugar at $\pounds 1.10$ per kilogram and $750 \ \text{g}$ of plain flour at $\pounds 1.12$ per kilogram. How much change did she receive from a $\pounds 5$ note?

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              A chocolate bar costs $36 \text{p}$. How many can Nikita buy for $\pounds 3.00$?

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              $ \begin{aligned} \text {Number of chocolate bar she can buy} &= \dfrac {3 \times 100 \text {p}} {36} \\ &= \dfrac {3 \times 2 \times 2 \times 25} {3 \times 2 \times 2 \times 3} \\ &= \dfrac {\cancel {3} \times \cancel {2} \times \cancel {2} \times 25} {\cancel {3} \times \cancel {2} \times \cancel {2} \times 3} \\ &= \dfrac {25} {3} \\ &= 8.3333 \\ &= 8 \end{aligned} $

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              $8$

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              the-london-independent-girls-schools-consortium--11-plus--maths--2008--group-2.toml

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              rag_ad_pr

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            • 80AF6598-5742-4BDF-B71B-8920EC92BDFB

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • tmoney

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Jenny pays $\pounds 156$ for six nights Bed and Breakfast accommodation. How much would it cost her to stay there for $8$ nights?

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              $ \begin{aligned} \text{Amount paid for six nights} &= \pounds 156 \\ \text{Amount paid for one night} &= \dfrac {156} {6} \\ &= \dfrac {26 \times 3 \times 2} {2 \times 3} \\ &= \dfrac {26 \times \cancel {3} \times \cancel {2}} {\cancel {2} \times \cancel {3}} \\ &= \pounds 26 \\ \text{Amount paid for eight nights} &= 8 \times 26 \\ &= \pounds 208 \end{aligned} $

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              $\pounds 208$

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              the-london-independent-girls-schools-consortium--11-plus--maths--2008--group-2.toml

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              rag_ad_pr

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            • D2BE2238-60CC-4D8A-94E4-E86779D1F0CC

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • tmoney

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Charlotte buys $500 \ \text{g}$ of cheese which costs $\pounds 5.30$ per kilogram, six bananas at $15 \text{p}$ each and two chocolate bars at $56 \text{p}$ each. How much change will she have from a ten pound note?

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              $1$ kg $=$ $1000$ g

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              $\pounds 1$ $=$ $100 \text{p}$

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              $ \begin{aligned} \text{Cheese} &= \dfrac {500} {1000} \ \text{kg} \times 5.30 \\ &= 0.5 \times 5.30 \\ &= \pounds 2.65 \end{aligned} $

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              $ \begin{aligned} \text{Bananas} &= 6 \times \pounds \dfrac {15} {100} \\ &= 6 \times 0.15 \\ &= \pounds 0.9 \end{aligned} $

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              $ \begin{aligned} \text{Chocolate bars} &= 2 \times \pounds \dfrac {56} {100} \\ &= 2 \times 0.56 \\ &= \pounds 1.12 \end{aligned} $

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              $ \begin{aligned} \text {Change received} &= 10 - (\dfrac {500} {1000} \ \text{kg} \times 5.30 + 6 \times \pounds \dfrac {15} {100} + 2 \times \pounds \dfrac {56} {100}) \\ &= 10 - (0.5 \times 5.30 + 6 \times 0.15 + 2 \times 0.56) \\ &= 10 - (2.65 + 0.9 + 1.12) \\ &= 10 - 4.67 \\ &= \pounds 5.33 \end{aligned} $

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              $\pounds 5.33$

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              the-london-independent-girls-schools-consortium--11-plus--maths--2008--group-2.toml

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              rag_ad_pr

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            • 74AB88AF-4A3E-477E-8383-D48E6F740187

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • tmoney

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Maria telephoned Priya on her mobile. The rate for the first three minutes was $7 \text{p}$ per minute. After that the telephone call cost $5 \text{p}$ per minute. The telephone call lasted $21 \ \text{minutes}$. How much did it cost?

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              $ \begin{aligned} \text{Total cost} &= 7 \times 3 + 5 \times 18 \\ &= 21 + 90 \\ &= 111 \text{p} \end{aligned} $

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              $111 \text{p}$

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              the-london-independent-girls-schools-consortium--11-plus--maths--2008--group-2.toml

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  $32$ students and $4$ members of staff from Encrypt School are going to a lecture on code-breaking.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  Code-Breaking Lecture

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  Ticket Prices

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  Students: $\pounds 14.00$ each Adults: $\pounds 15.00$ each

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  $1$ free adult ticket provided with every $10$ student tickets purchased

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  How much will the tickets cost in total for the school party?

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  Amir, Anna and Arjun have bought some fruit at a market stall.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  Amir bought $2$ Pears and $1$ Mango for $\pounds 1.35$

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  Anna bought $1$ Pear and $2$ Mangos for $\pounds 1.20$

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  Arjun bought $1$ Pear, $1$ Mango and $1$ Apple for $\pounds 1$

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  How much, in pence, did the apple cost?

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  Brendan and Sophie got $\pounds 0.20$ change when they paid with $\pounds 5$ for some tomatoes, green peppers and cucumbers which they bought at a farm stand.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  They bought $5$ tomatoes, which weighed $2 \ \text{pounds}$ altogether.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  They bought two more tomatoes than green peppers.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  How many cucumbers did they buy?

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  Alisha wants to exchange the coins in her money box for $\pounds 5$ notes. She has

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  Twelve $50 \text{p}$ coins

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  Eighteen $20 \text{p}$ coins
