                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      The Crystal Cinema shows the following prices for tickets and for popcorn.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      Tickets

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      Adult $\pounds 6.50$

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      Child $\pounds 3.00$

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      Popcorn

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      Large $\pounds 2.20$

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      Small $\pounds 1.50$

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      Mr and Mrs Jenkins and their $2$ children go to the cinema. Each child has a small bag of popcorn and the adults share a large bag of popcorn. Mr Jenkins pays for the popcorn and the tickets with a $\pounds 50$ note.

She collects the car at $2.15 \ \text{pm}$. How much does she have to pay?

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Car Park Charges

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Time Charge

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Up to $1 \ \text{hour}$ $20 \text{p}$

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              $1$ to $2 \ \text{hours}$ $50 \text{p}$

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              $2$ to $3 \ \text{hours}$ $\pounds 1.00$

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              $3$ to $4 \ \text{hours}$ $\pounds 1.70$

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Over to $4 \ \text{hours}$ $\pounds 5.00$

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                A pineapple costs $\pounds 2.47$.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                James has a $\pounds 10$ note.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                He buys as many pineapples as he can with his $\pounds 10$ note.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                %empty%

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                %empty%

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  • How many pineapples does James buy?

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    $ \begin{aligned} \text {Total pineapples he buys} &= \dfrac {10} {2.47} \\ &= 4.0485 \\ &= 4 \end{aligned} $

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    $4$

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    • How much change should James receive from his $\pounds 10$ note?

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      $ \begin{aligned} \text {Change received} &= 10 - 4 \times 2.47 \\ &= 10 - 9.88 \\ &= 0.12 \text{p} \end{aligned} $

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      $0.12 \text{p}$

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    the-london-independent-girls-schools-consortium--11-plus--maths--2012--group-2.toml

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    rag_ad_pr

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  • ED51D194-C5FA-45F5-8072-BA5973BA5747

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    • tmoney
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    • tcoin

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    Claire bought an ice cream costing $\pounds 1.55$ and a can of drink costing $67$ pence. She paid with a $\pounds 5$ note.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    TODOWORKING

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    TODOANSWER

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      • How much change should Claire receive?

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        TODOWORKING

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        TODOANSWER

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        • Claire was given the exact change, using the smallest possible number of coins. How many coins was Claire given?

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          TODOANSWER

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        the-london-independent-girls-schools-consortium--11-plus--maths--2013--group-1.toml

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        rag_up_notstarted

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      • 17131C86-8915-4E9B-A3C5-B02B1A2A9B0F

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        • tmoney

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        A packet of $7$ Doggy chews cost $\pounds 3.43$

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        %empty%

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        %empty%

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          • What is the cost of one Doggy Chew?

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            Give your answer in pence.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            As per the question, cost of seven Doggy Chews $= \pounds 3.43$. So,

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            $ \begin{aligned} \text{Cost of one Doggy Chew} &= \pounds 3.43 \div 7 \\ &= (3.43 \times 100) \ \text {pence} \div 7 \\ &= 343 \ \text {pence} \div 7 \\ &= \dfrac {343} {7} \\ &= \dfrac {49 \times 7} {7} \\ &= \dfrac {49 \times \cancel {7}} {\cancel {7}} \\ &= 49 \ \text {pence} \end{aligned} $

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            $49 \ \text {pence}$

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            • Charolette buys $2$ packets of Doggy Chews and pays with a $\pounds 20$ note.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              How much change should she receive?

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              As per the question, cost of one packet of Doggy Chew $= \pounds 3.43$. So,

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              $ \begin{aligned} \text{Cost of two packets of Doggy Chew} &= 3.43 \times 2 \\ &= \pounds 6.86 \\ \text {Change she should receive} &= 20 - 6.86 \\ &= \pounds 13.14 \end{aligned} $

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              $\pounds 13.14$

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            the-london-independent-girls-schools-consortium--11-plus--maths--2013--group-2.toml

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            rag_nj_pr

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • Paula was given $\pounds 40$ for her birthday.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                She used some of this money to buy a scarf for $\pounds 14.95$ and a hat for $\pounds 8.45$

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                How much of her birthday money does she have left?

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          • Jill buys one of each type of dark chocolate and each type of milk chocolate as a gift for her friend.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            Using your answer to part (a) or otherwise, work out the cost of all $10$ chocolates.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        • 242EEF52-EC83-4981-9213-C3AB0000BF4B

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          • tmoney
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          • talgebra

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          Emily bought a sandwich and a muffin from the cafe.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          She paid for these with a $\pounds 10$ note, and received $\pounds 4.36$ change.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          Given that the sandwich cost $\pounds 3.85$, how much did the muffin cost?

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          TODOWORKING

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          TODOANSWER

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          David wants to buy $1 \ \text{kilogram}$ of Ethiopian coffee.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          He usually buys $250 \ \text{g}$ bags, which cost $\pounds 3.90$ each.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          However, he notices that the shop has a special offer on $100 \ \text{g}$ bags. Each bag costs $\pounds 1.85$, but for every two bags you buy, you get a third bag free.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          How much does David save by buying $1 \ \text{kilogram}$ of coffee in $100 \ \text{g}$ bags rather than in $250 \ \text{g}$ bags?

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          How much more does it cost to buy $250 \text{g}$ of ground coffee than $250 \text{g}$ of coffee beans?

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  Myrtle wants to buy an ice-cream.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  The options are:

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  TODOWORKING

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      You may not need all of the lines in the table.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      She hopes to make a line of coins that measures $1 \ \text{km}$.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      A $10 \text{p}$ coin has a diameter of $25 \ \text{mm}$.
