                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        rag_up_notstarted

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      • EA27B9DD-790C-44A0-8752-26E1204AF515

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        • tmoney
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        • talgebra

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        Ben wants to buy $17$ small bottles of drink for a party. A shop sells them at: $15 \text{p}$$ for $1$ bottle; $28 \text{p}$$ for two bottles; $60 \text{p}$$ for a pack of $5$ bottles. What is the smallest amount of money he needs to spend? [Give your answer in $\pounds s]

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        Let the smallest amount of money he needs to pay be $= a$

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        As per the question,

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        Smallest amount is achieved only when he buys three packs of 5 bottles and one pack of 2 bottles.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        $ \begin{aligned} a &= 3 \times 60 \text{p} + 2 \times 28 \text{p} \\ a &= 180 + 56 \\ a &= 236 \text{p} \\ a &= \pounds \dfrac {236} {100} \\ a &= \pounds 2.36 \end{aligned} $

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        $\pounds 2.36$

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        the-perse-school--11-plus--maths--9999--specimen-paper-2.toml

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        rag_ac_pr

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        • tmoney
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        • tnumber

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        Alison went to the supermarket.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        She bought two cans of cola costing $53 \text{p}$$ each, three packets of crisps costing $27 \text{p}$$ each and a large bar of chocolate that costs $$\pounds 1.24$.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        How much change did she get from $$\pounds 5$?

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        Let the change Alison recieved = $a \text{p}$

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        $\pounds 5$ = $5 \times 100 \text{p}$ = $500 \text{p}$

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        As per the question,

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        $ \begin{aligned} 2 \times 53 \text{p} + 3 \times 27 \text{p} + 124 \text{p} + a \text{p} &= 500 \text{p} \\ 106 + 81 + 124 + a &= 500 \\ 311 + a &= 500 \\ a &= 500 - 311 \\ a &= 189 \text{p} \end{aligned} $

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        Change Alison recieved = $189 \text{p}$

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        $189 \text{p}$

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        the-queens-school--11-plus--maths--9999--sample-paper-1.toml

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        rag_ac_pr

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      • 9F5604EB-F79E-4CB6-8EE3-55D385FB760A

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        • tmoney
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        • talgebra

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        Concert tickets for $4$ adults cost a total of $\pounds 62.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        Children are admitted at half price.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        What would it cost for $2$ adults and a child to attend the same concert?

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        As per the question,

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        Cost of tickets for $4$ adults = $\pounds 62$

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        Cost of ticket for $1$ adult = $\dfrac {62}{4}$ $ \begin{aligned} &= 15 \dfrac{2} {4} \\ &= 15 \dfrac {2} {2 \times 2} \\ &= 15 \dfrac {\cancel {2}} {\cancel {2} \times 2} \\ &= 15 \dfrac {1} {2} \\ &= \pounds 15.5 \end{aligned} $

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        Cost of ticket for $1$ adult = $\pounds 15.5$

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        Cost of ticket for $1$ child = $\pounds \dfrac{15.5} {2} = \pounds 7.75$

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        Cost for $2$ adults and one child to attend the concert = $2 \times 15.5 + 1 \times 7.75$

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        $ \begin{aligned} &= 2 \times 15.5 + 1 \times 7.75 \\ &= 31 + 7.75 \\ &= \pounds 38.75 \end{aligned} $

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        Cost for $2$ adults and one child to attend the concert = $\pounds 38.75$

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        $\pounds 38.75$

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        the-queens-school--11-plus--maths--9999--sample-paper-1.toml

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        rag_ac_pr

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      • FAA9D4DD-A49C-481F-AA0D-5E8446EF93DA

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        • tmoney
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        • talgebra

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        It costs $$\pounds 400$ to carpet a room measuring $2\, metres$ by $3\, metres$. How much would it costto carpet another room measuring $4\, metres$ by $6\, metres$ with the same carpet?

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        As per the question,

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        Cost to carpet a room measuring $2\, metres$ by $3\, metres$ = $\pounds 400$

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        Area of a room measuring $2\, metres$ by $3\, metres$ = $2 \times 3 = 6 \text{m}^2$

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        Cost to carpet a room measuring $1\, metres$ by $1\, metres$ = $\dfrac{400} {6}$

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        Cost to carpet a room measuring $4\, metres$ by $6\, metres$ = $\dfrac{400} {6} \times 4 \times 6$ $ &= \dfrac{400} {\cancel {6}} \times 4 \times \cancel {6} \\\ &= \dfrac {400} \times 4 \\ &= \pounds 1600 $

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        Cost to carpet a room measuring $4\, metres$ by $6\, metres$ = $\pounds 1600$

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        $\pounds 1600$

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        the-queens-school--11-plus--maths--9999--sample-paper-1.toml

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    • tfraction

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    Ben has $$\pounds 68$. He gives a quarter of this to his sister. How much does he have left?

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    Total money = $\pounds 68$

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    Money left with Ben = Total money - $\dfrac {1} {4} \ \text{of} \ \pounds 68$

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    $ \begin{aligned} &= 68 - (\dfrac {1} {4} \times 68) \\ &= 68 - \dfrac {68} {4} \\ &= 68 - \dfrac {17 \times 4} {4} \\ &= 68 - \dfrac {17 \times \cancel {4}} {\cancel {4}} \\ &= 68 - 17 &= \pounds 51 \end{aligned} $

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    Money left with Ben = $\pounds 51$

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    $\pounds 51$

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    trinity-school-croydon--11-plus--maths--9999--sample-paper-1.toml

Give your answer in $\pounds

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        • How much change would you get from $$\pounds 10$ if you bought $1\, kg$ of grapes, $1$ melon and $1$ punnet of nectarines? Give your answer in $\pounds

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          TODOWORKING

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          TODOWORKING
